title: A funerall poem vppon the death of the late noble Earle of Deuonshyre
author: Daniel, Samuel, 1562-1619.
notes: The title page is xylographic, white-line.
The last page is a white-line xylographic panel.
Running title reads: A funerall poëme.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
